original: @18b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @18b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ratna m'a la n'a ma /
analyzed: ratna m'a la n'a ma /
translated: Ratnamala-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba /
translated: The Precious Garland

original: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Heruka.

original: mgon po kun gyi bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: mgon po kun gyi bdag nyid ni //
translated: The nature of all lords

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin ma grub pa'i //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin ma grub pa'i //
translated: Is not established as the nature of entities.

original: bla ma rje la phyag 'tshal nas //
analyzed: bla ma rje la phyag 'tshal nas //
translated: Having paid homage to the guru lord,

original: rin chen phreng ba bshad par bya //üîΩbsgom dang sgom rgyu rnal 'byor gyi //
analyzed: rin chen phreng ba bshad par bya // bsgom dang sgom rgyu rnal 'byor gyi //
translated: The precious garland will be explained.üîΩMeditation and the object of meditation

original: rtog pa de ni bden pa min //
analyzed: rtog pa de ni bden pa min //
translated: Are not true concepts of yoga.

original: bden gnyis grub pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bden gnyis grub pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the two truths are not established,

original: sgom la brten par mi bya'o //
analyzed: sgom la brten par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not rely on meditation.

original: chos kyi dbyings dang de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang de bzhin nyid //
translated: The dharmadhatu and suchness

original: gang yang rang bzhin rtogs pa de //
analyzed: gang yang rang bzhin rtogs pa de //
translated: Are realized as the nature.

original: zhi ba rang rig gnyis su med //
analyzed: zhi ba rang rig gnyis su med //
translated: Peace, self-awareness, and non-duality

original: bla ma dam pa'i dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma dam pa'i dgongs pa'o //
translated: Are the intention of the sublime guru.

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i shes rab ni //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i shes rab ni //
translated: Wisdom without characteristics

original: phyag rgya bla ma'i gdams ngag bcas //
analyzed: phyag rgya bla ma'i gdams ngag bcas //
translated: Is sealed with the guru's instructions.

original: phra zhing rang rgyud ye shes kyi //üîΩma rdzogs pa yi skad cig la //
analyzed: phra zhing rang rgyud ye shes kyi // ma rdzogs pa yi skad cig la //
translated: In the instant of the subtle, self-continuum wisdomüîΩThat is not complete,

original: yang dag grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Perfect accomplishment will not occur.

original: bla ma gnyis pa'i dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma gnyis pa'i dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the intention of the second guru.

original: rnam par rtog pa bden pa min //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa bden pa min //
translated: Conceptual thoughts are not true.

original: rtog med rjes su 'brel pa yi //
analyzed: rtog med rjes su 'brel pa yi //
translated: The nonconceptual is connected

original: rim gyis rnam rtog rnams dang bral //
analyzed: rim gyis rnam rtog rnams dang bral //
translated: with the gradual freedom from thoughts.

original: dper na tha gu sbrul 'dzin te //
analyzed: dper na tha gu sbrul 'dzin te //
translated: For example, a rope is grasped as a snake,

original: rnal 'byor rtog med bde ba che //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rtog med bde ba che //
translated: but the yogi‚Äôs nonconceptual state is great bliss.

original: bla ma gsum pa'i dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma gsum pa'i dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the intention of the third guru.

original: ma rig pa yi snang ba 'di //
analyzed: ma rig pa yi snang ba 'di //
translated: The appearances of ignorance

original: @19a * // rang rig ye shes rtogs gyur na //
analyzed: @19a * // rang rig ye shes rtogs gyur na //
translated: are realized as the wisdom of self-awareness.

original: rmi lam nyin mo'i snang ba rnams //
analyzed: rmi lam nyin mo'i snang ba rnams //
translated: The appearances of dreams and the daytime

original: mnyam pa nyid du don rtogs pas //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid du don rtogs pas //
translated: are realized as being of equal meaning.

original: tshor ba tshor byed gnyis su med //
analyzed: tshor ba tshor byed gnyis su med //
translated: There is no duality of feeling and the one who feels.üîΩThe yogi who does not abide

original: gnyis dang gnyis min spangs pa yi //üîΩgang la mi gnas rnal 'byor de //
analyzed: gnyis dang gnyis min spangs pa yi // gang la mi gnas rnal 'byor de //
translated: in either duality or nonduality

original: shes rab pha rol phyin pa yin //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pa yin //
translated: has reached the perfection of wisdom.

original: bla ma bzhi pa'i dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma bzhi pa'i dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the intention of the fourth guru.

original: bdag nyid sha la'o dgongs pa ni //
analyzed: bdag nyid sha la'o dgongs pa ni //
translated: The intention of ≈öƒÅlva is

original: dmigs med snying rje'i rnal 'byor ba //
analyzed: dmigs med snying rje'i rnal 'byor ba //
translated: the yoga of nonreferential compassion,

original: gnyis 'dzin gnyis med don rtogs can //
analyzed: gnyis 'dzin gnyis med don rtogs can //
translated: the realization of the nonduality of the two apprehensions,

original: zab mo'i chos nyid la gnas pas //
analyzed: zab mo'i chos nyid la gnas pas //
translated: and abiding in the profound dharmatƒÅ.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob 'gyur //
translated: One will attain the state of Vajrasattva.

original: rtog pa dang bral dri ma med //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bral dri ma med //
translated: Free from concepts, stainless,

original: rnal 'byor rol pa'i lta spyod ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rol pa'i lta spyod ni //
translated: The view and conduct of the yogic play,

original: chos rnams rang bzhin rtogs gyur na //
analyzed: chos rnams rang bzhin rtogs gyur na //
translated: When the nature of phenomena is realized,

original: bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis med rtogs //
analyzed: bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis med rtogs //
translated: The realization of the nonduality of happiness and suffering,

original: de ltar rtogs pas rang grol 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pas rang grol 'gyur //
translated: By such realization, one will be self-liberated.

original: rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon si la aa lis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon si la aa lis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The text called The Precious Garland composed by Master ≈öila is complete.
